website_summaries.verdict: A good, general spray gel that works for a variety of hairstyles and types. Good for general use.
pros: Works particularly well for those with short and thin hair
Makes a good alternative to heavier, thicker spray gels that tend to be difficult to wash out at the end of the day
Good for styling and sculpting the hair for long-lasting daily results
The spray is gentle on the hair and minimizes overspray
cons: Can be too thin for people who need a thicker spray formula

customer_reviews.title: This is watered down
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years and know what it should feel like and how it works on my hair. The first time I used it I noticed that after spraying and scrunching my hair, my hands had nothing on them. Like I had simply put water on my hair. Then my hair fell out after just minutes. So I sprayed it directly on my hand. It is almost nothing but water. There is a little bit of product so you have the correct smell, but this IS NOT Paul Mitchell sculpting gel. It is was an Amazon choice. Not returnable. Great scam!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Loree

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this knockoff!
customer_reviews.text: All of a sudden the Paul Mitchell spray products I am buying from Amazon appear to be knockoffs. I used to use this and loved it. This order was not like the product I was used to and I stopped buying it until I discovered that this spray was watered down. I recently bought this from Ulta and did a spray test. No comparison. The Amazon purchase was like water and the spray from Ulta was like the one I had used for years. Don't buy this product from Amazon. Buy it from a reputable salon or from Ulta.
customer_reviews.author: kathy champeau

customer_reviews.title: Curl Disappoiment!
customer_reviews.text: Paul Mitchel Soft Sculpting Spray Gel usually works well with my curly hair. This product does not seem to meet up to Paul Mitchel standards in any way. It smells like watered down alcohol. There is no comparison to the same product I’ve purchased at my local salon. Unable to be used on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sculpting spray I have found for my fine, short hair. You can use as much or as little as you need, it will not get sticky or stiff, gives me hair some body and hold and looks natural. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: MJ from Milton

customer_reviews.title: I was sent the wrong product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 bottles of this soft sculpting GEL several months back to make sure I don’t run out. I finally finished the bottle I had been using and grabbed one of these. I realized they sent me HAIRSPRAY, not GEL. I realized this by spraying it all over my damp, freshly washed hair. Awesome. The gel is a great product and is what I ordered, I wish that’s what they sent me.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Williams (TheLashBomb dot com)

customer_reviews.title: Works for Me
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine, straight hair. Bought this based on reviews. I really appreciate the reviews. Gives me an idea of what to expect. I have tried many, many sprays, gels, potions, etc. Have wasted much money. Thrown them or given them all away. I really like this because it does not make my hair gummy, oily or stiff. I does add a little bit of body, but I also have bone straight hair that is also very fine, CURSED! I will be buying again, as this is the only thing that I like.
customer_reviews.author: Summerof69

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help hold my hair in the manner I blow dried and flat ironed. It really doesn't do that, but at least the two pieces I wanted to stay straight don't curl all the way up. (I have cow-licks at my temples and a bob hair cut.) EDIT Dec 2019. I have a bit different cut and am using different shampoo and conditioner which are more hydrating and now this product works way better. I am happy and like it and will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: C Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great spray gel
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Paul Mitchell’s soft sculpting spray gel for years. I love it because it’s a nice light spray you use when your hair is wet. It gives your hair body without being sticky or weighing it down.
customer_reviews.author: jonesgirlfromPittsburgh

customer_reviews.title: Nice High Quality Product.
customer_reviews.text: I'm in my senior years now, and I have always washed & rolled my hair up myself. I have used this product for several years on my hair. I put it on after washing it and rolling it up in my little pink rollers. It really helps my natural curly hair, which is not as thick and plentiful as it used to be. This spray is great when it's humid outside. It helps keep my hair from frizzing and losing it's curl. Highly recommend this product and am happy that I am able to get it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loose lid, product leaked, Amazon won't replace.
customer_reviews.text: Received product, but the product leaked in shipping losing a noticeable amount of product, box in good shape. Bottle packaged in a bag, liquid in bag... lid was not tight. Attempted to return product for replacement but notified it can't be returned b/c it is flammable. So, I paid full price for a partial bottle and the seller has no recourse + Amazon has removed themselves from customer support because of ingredients. Customer service fail! First time I have ever been disappointed by Amazon Prime membership.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Do not like this product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because it's cheaper than the Redken Curvaceous CCC Spray Gel. This product doesn't even begin to compare. It's very watery and and I have to use a lot to get the same effect as the Redken, so much, that I have to use my infuser to dry my hair. I will not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: KSB

customer_reviews.title: Great value size!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this spray gel for several months now-- it's just $8.99 for 8 fl oz at my local grocery store. I was delighted to find this value size here! This spray gel is non-sticky, not stiff, but provides great flexible hold for scrunching a perm while blow drying. A+
customer_reviews.author: heatherbree23

customer_reviews.title: Thin Fine Hair
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works pretty well. I have thin, fine hair with a bit of a wave. Soft Sculpting Spray Gel is nice and lightweight, so it does not weigh my hair down. I feel like it protects my hair at least a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: debi w

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I have fine thin hair that is naturally wavy. In 2011 to my devastation Catwalk discontinued their Curls Rock spray. I had such brand loyalty that I bought all the cases I could find. After 9 years, I was down to the last case and apprehensively needed to find a new product. A product that with a diffuser would give my thin wavy hair curls that bounce and come to life. No crunch, no weight, just curls. It is this product right here! Thank God!!!
customer_reviews.author: John Christopher Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Good product that’s not too sticky
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using PM Soft Sculpting Spray Gel for about 15 years. It’s perfect for taming fine flyaway hair without weighting it down. It’s a very light spray and it’s not sticky. I use PM Round Trip Gel after the spray gel to acquire a scrunching hold.
customer_reviews.author: TJSKLS

customer_reviews.title: Good for Teen Bed Head
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this several times for my son. He sprays it on crazy dry hair in the morning and his hair looks nice and groomed. Don't use too much or you will have wet looking and crunchy hair. It also holds fine hair well. This is a great product. I much prefer this to sticky gel in a tube.
customer_reviews.author: JRA

customer_reviews.title: soft curls
customer_reviews.text: My son is very particular about not having crunchy hair so we have looked high and low. This is his pick, doesn't leave hands stick, keeps a soft, non frizzy look and wont leave hair crunchy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine, curly hair.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Use it on wet hair but need a mousse with it. But on the second day after my shampoo when the curls are looking tired, this makes the curls looks great and adds body to my fine, droopy hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ross SJC

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and effectrive
customer_reviews.text: Great product for touching up rogue hair! Just a spritz on a comb or brush handles the offending clump. Dries quickly, and hair can be brushed/styled easily with the control remaining.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Not Sticky Hold
customer_reviews.text: Works great for doing my son's hair without it being stiff. Use it to tame my flyaways too. Has a weird smell but has no smell after drying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hair gel
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for quite a while.....love it and yet have had a time trying to find it i stores.....very light weight on your hair and really holds very well
customer_reviews.author: K. Schutt,

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Really good for dry, naturally curly hair. Love Paul Mitchell products. Have used for years.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy1960

customer_reviews.title: Husband like this spray gel
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes this hair gel. We've ordered the spray bottles 3 times. This time I decided to order the large bottle to refill the smaller bottles.
customer_reviews.author: J.L

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a hair spray that works for thin hair. This so far is the best. It holds well, light and does not have a scent.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I have used this soft sculpting spray gel for many years. It’s my favorite because it’s light, easy to use and doesn’t weigh my hair down. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great control.
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally curly and fuzzy hair. This controls both. Can't get along without it.
customer_reviews.author: lynn y. Sawtelle

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Light
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is a soft spray gel so that my hair doesn’t end up stiff from other types of gel I’ve used. It keeps your hair styled and “light”
customer_reviews.author: Tomy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Soft hair spray
customer_reviews.text: I'm a man and I have straight hair and I just needed something to hold my hair in place without being stiff. This soft spray works great w/o being stiff. I have been using it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Best product for my fine curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I have vert fine curly had and in the summer it becomes unmanageable to say the least. My hair is always frizzy and crazy in the humid weather. I love this gel because it maintains my curl and makes my hair manageable on the summer. I just add some when hair is wet and allow to air dry. My hair does not feel dry or brittle like other gels and mousses make it. Worth the extra price.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara P. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: LIfts the hair for better shaping without stickiness or stiffness. A really good product at a really good value!

customer_reviews.title: Great conditioner spray
customer_reviews.text: Love this spray. Works well to add to aves to hair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best spray gel out there!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, smells good, fare pricing, salon quality. I have been using this spray gel for 20+ years. Hope they keep making it. Can’t live without it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Like water...No different
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the same as using water...I am very upset and will purchase this at a salon. Funny my hair is so this and yet this did very little to ever impress me at all!

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I use this every time I set my hair with hot rollers. It is not sticky or stiff.

customer_reviews.title: Good value

customer_reviews.title: I like this hair spray. The smell, the amount of "Hold".

customer_reviews.title: Very good

customer_reviews.title: Love this spray
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair and this helps to give it body and not make it too sticky to style.

customer_reviews.title: Great pre-styling product

customer_reviews.title: The smell makes me breathe difficulty.
customer_reviews.text: When applying, I smell something uncomfortable that make me breath hard and difficulty. I have to go an open area to breathe for a while and then my symptom alleviates.

customer_reviews.title: Product was a little sticky, I was not expecting ...

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative....
customer_reviews.text: This product is a nice alternative for those days when your hair needs additional hold without the sticky hairspray. Very light spray gel. Leaves the hair more manageable without all the sticky hairspray and other products.

customer_reviews.title: It's just what I need!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years to make my hair more manageable. No reason to change products.

customer_reviews.title: Read above

customer_reviews.title: Great Spray Gell  -  Poor Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I really line the hair spray. However, the manufacturer must have changed to a different bottle. The sprayer part of the bottle does not focus the spray. Instead the spray has a very wide radius that it covers (including my face). I had to pour the spray into another bottle that worked better. Besides the packaging, this spray is nice. I would buy the spray again, but realize that it will need to be poured into a different bottle.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Paul Mitchell Soft Sculpting Spray Gel
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite product for my hair. I can work with it and never have to worry about stickyness. I just spray it in and blow dry my hair.

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Have used it for years

It feels like you put a ton of extra hold hair spray on your hair when you shower the next day, while the Paul Mitchell simply washes out with water and no problems.

product_meta.title: Paul Mitchell Soft Sculpting Spray Gel
product_meta.description:
Size:16.9 Fl. OzEasily create natural-looking hairstyles with Soft Sculpting Spray Gel from Paul Mitchell. This lightweight spray hair gel contains emollient conditioners and styling agents that boost body, provide flexible control and create a soft, natural-looking finish with incredible shine and reflection. Hair Type: Ideal for All Hair Types. Fragrance: Breezy, bright scent of honey peach and Valencia orange entwined with refreshing notes of white floral and lily of the valley. Stylist Tip: Mist onto hair and scrunch with fingers for defined, natural curls with light hold.

BRAND STORY
Paul Mitchell is results-driven hair care from John Paul Mitchell Systems—the leader of salon-quality products committed to the professional beauty industry. Every purchase supports JPMS salons with a commission.
